scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/styles/scss -o src/styles/ --watch --recursive --source-map true --source-map-contents sass
scripts.min-scss: node-sass-chokidar --output-style compressed src/styles/scss/index.scss > index.css cat src/styles/scss/index.scss | node-sass-chokidar --output-style compressed > index.css
